title: Cinematic Piano - Volume 2
description: 10 cinematic piano themes for deep emotional content with multiple loops and shorter edits
longDescription:
Also take a look "Cinematic Piano - Volume 1"


Preview the collection: YouTube


"Cinematic Piano - Volume 2" is the second installment of cinematic piano themes for adventures, RPG, fantasy games and deep emotional contents. 10 full length themes, multiple loops and shorter versions for a complete editing solution.


  • Better Days: Full length (01:38), 1 Short edit, 6 Loops
  • Ambient Piano: Full length (02:41), 1 Short edit, 4 Loops
  • Under The Rain: Full length (02:05), 2 Short edits, 4 Loops
  • Travels: Full length (03:24), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Cinematic Piano Lullaby: Full length (02:11), 2 Short edits, 3 Loops
  • Bon Voyage: Full length (02:43), 3 Short edits, 9 Loops
  • Symbolism: Full length (01:27), 3 Short edit, 4 Loops
  • We Dream Together: Full length (02:30), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • We Dream Together (Solo): Full length (02:30), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • Black And White: Full length (02:00), 2 Short edits, 4 Loops
  • Solo Piano Romance: Full length (01:36), 2 Short edits, 4 Loops
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Full length tracks (+1 Alternative edit)
  •  20 Short edits
  •  49 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 80

Number of Audio Cues: 80

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 89:22

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
